tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE changes_tracking (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    geospatial_data GEOMETRY
)

CREATE TABLE changes (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  object_id INT NOT NULL,
  geometry GEOGRAPHY,
  change_type VARCHAR,
  change_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT);

CREATE TABLE history (history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  object_id INT NOT NULL,
  field_name VARCHAR,
  old_value VARCHAR,
  new_value VARCHAR,
  change_timestamp TIMESTAMP);
